exceptions.exn: In environment Hf, Hg : R_UniformSpace -> R Hneq : R_UniformSpace Unable to unify "Rbar" with "locally Hneq (fun x : R_UniformSpace => Hf x = Hg x)".

exceptions.tactic: apply is_lim_comp with (l := Lim f (Lim g x)).
exceptions.exn: The reference g was not found in the current environment.

original: intros Hf Hg Hneq. apply is_lim_unique. apply is_lim_comp with (l := Lim f (Lim g x)). - apply Lim_correct. apply Hf. - apply Lim_correct. apply Hg. - apply Hneq.
